mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mentoring (follower, guider, mtitle, mcontent, field, lang) VALUE (#{follower}, #{guider}, #{mtitle}, #{mcontent}, #{field}, #{lang});
mapper.update: UPDATE mentoring SET mreply = #{mreply}, replydate = now() WHERE mtrno = #{mtrno};
mapper.select: SELECT mtrno, follower, guider, field, lang, mtitle, mcontent, mreply, DATE_FORMAT(regdate, '%Y년 %m월 %d일') regdate, DATE_FORMAT(replydate, '%Y년 %m월 %d일') replydate, likecnt FROM mentoring WHERE mtrno = #{value}

SELECT mtr.mtrno, mtr.guider, mtr.field, mtr.lang, mtr.mtitle, mtr.mreply, DATE_FORMAT(mtr.regdate, '%Y년 %m월 %d일') regdate, DATE_FORMAT(mtr.replydate, '%Y년 %m월 %d일') replydate, mtr.likecnt, m.mname FROM mentoring mtr JOIN member m ON m.email = mtr.guider WHERE guider = #{guider} and follower = #{follower} ORDER BY mtr.regdate DESC

SELECT mtr.mtrno, mtr.follower, mtr.mtitle, mtr.mcontent, DATE_FORMAT(mtr.regdate, '%Y년 %m월 %d일') regdate, DATE_FORMAT(mtr.replydate, '%Y년 %m월 %d일') replydate, m.mname FROM mentoring mtr JOIN member m ON mtr.follower = m.email WHERE guider = #{value} ORDER BY mtrno DESC
